title: Linux rename Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the Linux rename command to efficiently rename files and directories. Explore practical examples and batch renaming techniques.

meta.title: Linux rename Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the Linux rename command to efficiently rename files and directories. Explore practical examples and batch renaming techniques.
meta.keywords: Linux, rename, file, directory, batch, rename command, file operations

verify.name: Verify the rename command
verify.hint: Ensure that you have successfully renamed the .txt files to .doc files using the rename command.

steps.title: Rename Files Using the rename Command

verify.name: Verify file renaming
verify.hint: Ensure that you have successfully renamed the files using the rename command, including renaming a single file and adding a prefix to multiple files.

steps.title: Batch Rename Files with the rename Command

verify.name: Verify batch file renaming
verify.hint: Ensure that you have successfully batch renamed the files using the rename command, including renaming all .txt files to .doc and adding a prefix to all .jpg files.
